message: The interior is so white as to be blinding, and has the sterile feel of a hospital.
Our reflections glint coldly on the walls and floor, which are polished to a mirror shine.
I've heard that part of the tower is open to the public, but we came in through the back entrance, so there aren't any guests around.
As we make our way carefully down the hall, we glimpse a guard walking toward us.
We slip into a side hallway and hold our breath.
After the guard has passed, we quietly return to the hall, keeping an eye on our surroundings.
At the end of the hall, we find an elevator.
Just to be safe, we make sure the guard is far away before making a dash for the elevator.
The moment we step into the waiting elevator, Noiz pushes the button for the top floor.
The elevator takes off with a jolt.
I breathe a small sigh of relief. Too early to relax...
The beeping of a Coil draws my attention. Noiz is looking at a map.
I wonder if he has some kind of plan.
After some time, the elevator slows to a stop, and the doors open.
